subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[take off]] (clothes); to [[peel off]]; to [[strip]]
# to [[get away]] from; to [[escape]]; to [[leave]]; to [[avoid]]
# to [[leave out]]; to [[miss]]; to [[omit]]
# [[rapid]]; [[swift]]; [[fast]]
# [[unaffected]]; [[free]]; [[at ease]]
